summary: First, greetings to all and sorry for my English,. This mod adds a completely new and functional house in Riverwood. Contains new furniture and rooms for all needs of the player.added to mod new meshes, textures, furniture ...
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-1-1346176848.png[/img]
First, greetings to all and sorry for my English,. This mod adds a completely new and functional Player house in Riverwood, to the left of the gerdur\'s house. Contains new furniture and rooms for all needs of the player.added to mod new meshes, textures, furniture ...
Contents of the Chamber Sky: 
-Smithing
-Alchemy-Lab.
-Laboratory of enchantment.
-Bedrooms
-kitchens
-Cabinets
-A route till the mountaintops.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-3-1346176848.png[/img]
0-Make backup files to models remplaces. data/textures/architecture/farmhouse.
1. Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
2. Find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim.
3. Move the Data folder into your Skyrim folder.
4. Merge the folder when asked, it will not get replaced.
5. Activate HoringarHome.esp (WHIT  NEXUS MANAGER).

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-4-1346176848.png[/img]

1. Deactivate HoringarHome.esp
2. remplazar la copia de seguridad de: data/textures/architecture/farmhouse
3. Delete the HoringarHome.esp file

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-5-1346176848.png[/img]
There will imcompatible with nothing but with other mods that put something where this is located.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/21416-5-1346176865.png[/img]
-Strotis Rustic Furniture Resource by stroti
-Sexy Villages and Towns by horrorview.

* Please note that this mod contains the Villages and Towns Sexy mod by horrorview. All villages and towns (farmhouses) will be replaced.
author: balrog124578koko
